title: Cybersecurity firm SentinelOne explores sale
text:
[https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/cybersecurity-firm-sentinelone-explores-sale-sources-2023-08-21/](https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/cybersecurity-firm-sentinelone-explores-sale-sources-2023-08-21/)

Will someone step up and save us from Kaseya?

comments.text: If K touches this, Im staying as far as possible and just stick with Huntress
If Kaseya buys S1 it's fucking over.
It's a publicly traded company on the NYSE (Symbol **S**). Have at it. Although, it is currently up 16% on this news so, you may prefer to short.
I really hope Kaseya doesn't buy them. I will jump ship and I won't think twice.
Well, here's hoping Huntress doesn't go this route. I think S1 will go to crap once they sell to an equity firm.
These companies always seem to go downhill after being sold.
If they sell to Kaseya, they will 100% lose all business from our MSP.
This sub LOVES S1. If K bought them, i wonder if that would change or if there'd just be a lot of grumpy MSPs still renewing and using their S1 licenses?
